00051         enum MessageType
00052         {
00053             MT_DATA = 0,       // Should never need this message type
00054             MT_TEST,           // Test sound
00055             MT_GHDL_FN,        // Get handle for given filename

00057             MT_PTFI_FN_1I,     // Prepare for file transmission, filename & size
